website_summaries.verdict: This pre-assembled hive from a well-respected company comes with many of the tools you need to get started in beekeeping (except the bees), including a protective veil and gloves.
pros: This kit includes the hive body, ten frames with wax foundation, painted bottom board, entrance reducer, telescoping cover, inner cover, smoker with guard, hive tool, leather gloves, Alexander bee veil, and an informational book
A very good value for the price
cons: You’ll need to buy a super, frame grip, spacing tool, and feeder separately
You might want to replace the bottom board with a screened bottom
The Alexander veil requires that you wear a hat underneath

customer_reviews.title: Missing Items
customer_reviews.text: This is everything that came out of that box. Notice how in the box under "Kit Accessories" the first two items listed says hive tool and leather gloves. These items were NOT INCLUDED in the box. It drove me crazy looking for them because I knew they were supposed to be inside. I even searched between every frame and inside the smoker. Unfortunately I could not return the kit and had use the hive anyway because my nuc had already arrived, so I went out and bought those items separately at the local store. Very inconvenient starter kit!
customer_reviews.author: Annie Le

customer_reviews.title: Perfect start up kit
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect start up kit. Just remember to buy some feeders too to help your bees through drought and build up their stores.
customer_reviews.author: Olof

customer_reviews.title: Falls Apart-RUN
customer_reviews.text: Falling apart literally after 4 weeks outside and only 2 mild rains. Save your money and just contact your local beekeeping association and ask for recommendations. Sad to see this crappy of quality from a large name in the beekeeping business.
customer_reviews.author: Kirstyn

customer_reviews.title: "Everything" but....
customer_reviews.text: This kit does NOT include a feeder! You will need one to start your hive. Otherwise, it is a good starter kit. Quality is OK for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gift, fast delivery.
customer_reviews.text: It was a birthday gift for my husband. He loves it. It came super fast. Great start up kit. He is now a bee keeper.
customer_reviews.author: Sierra Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: Missing a few necessities
customer_reviews.text: This is missing a couple major things. It's missing the feeder and the bottom screen. We also had to buy a bee brush another box for the feeder and several other things before getting our bees.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: It was a Christmas gift for my husband and he is quite excited. It has not been put together or anything cause it is winter here so... Everything was just what he wanted. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Rita Arkison

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter and son-in-law, who wanted to try beekeeping for the firs time. They found it easy to set up, and are enjoying it. No honey yet, but it's early!
customer_reviews.author: hunt sweitzer

customer_reviews.title: Getting started
customer_reviews.text: Quality basics so you start right. No flopping around with the question of 8 or 10 frame or trying to choose what you need. Get 10, it means your equipment fits with others.
customer_reviews.author: Charles A. Long

customer_reviews.title: ... my first hive and it seems to be built good, I will be adding my bees on April ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my first hive and it seems to be built good, I will be adding my bees on April 14th and will need to buy a few other options as a feeder and more boxes as they grow, willl like to get matching parts as i stack up just dont see where i will get them here??? excited to get started
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife for Christmas. We just opened it to set up so we could add the bees and it was packaged well but broken inside. There were no dents or rips of the box. Looked like a great starter package, but obviously it was packed broken.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Bentley

customer_reviews.title: Excellent choice for the new beekeeper!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely loved the kit! Includes everything needed for a beginner beekeeper. Excellent quality and very sturdy. I would most definitely order from this seller again. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Erin Queen

customer_reviews.title: Great for Start up
customer_reviews.text: This is almost perfect to get started in beekeeping. I prefer a complete suit which I had to buy separate and some type of feeder had to be purchased, otherwise this will get you started
customer_reviews.author: Kappi

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful, well built product. I’m quite pleased with purchase. Set it up right by my pollinator mix that I planted a year prior.
customer_reviews.author: Murrweed

customer_reviews.title: Good starter
customer_reviews.text: Don't have my bees yet, so don't know how they'll like it, but seems to be a good start for someone just getting into beekeeping. Probably could contact a local beekeeper and buy piecemeal cheaper, but this isn't a bad start. I have supplemented since ordering this with varroa mite screen, slatted bottom board and a super, so don't assume this will be your only investment.
customer_reviews.author: Paige

customer_reviews.title: My box arrived today with a two large cracks in ...
customer_reviews.text: My box arrived today with a two large cracks in the side. This should have been caught in production! Am frustrated because I have live bees, a box I cannot use, and I have to wait two more days for a box. Original review: 1 star Edit:// my new box arrived yesterday and it was perfect. Not completely level on the bottom board, but the bees will fix that and fill in the cracks. Will report back as it wears. Changed review to 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Ok as a starter
customer_reviews.text: The hive came ready to go. Only thing is- no feeder of any type ( okay because I'm just starting). I would have loved to have an excluder and a super but I have old equipment that can be used.
customer_reviews.author: jason scruggs

customer_reviews.title: Not sufficiently described.
customer_reviews.text: The veil provided with this kit requires a helmet (not included in the kit or in the information) to be worn underneath.
customer_reviews.author: Charles H. Collier

customer_reviews.title: Very low quality product
customer_reviews.text: This product is of very low quality. The bottom board and the beehive body do not fit together properly, there is a gap of more than 1/4" on one side, see pictures attached. There was oil and grease on parts of the inner cover and the telescopic cover that makes you wonder if new materials were used for its manufacture. Overall construction quality was poor, it is a total shame for a made in America product. I did not return it as I had an emergency with a swarm that had landed in my backyard and needed the box, but I would certainly not buy their products in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Van Math

customer_reviews.title: It came assembled and it has everything I need to get started!
customer_reviews.text: This kit has everything I need to get started. Really fast shipping too!
customer_reviews.author: lmwest

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what I wanted in order to start my new hive! Love it! Comes with everything you need. The veil is a little flimsy, but it works.
customer_reviews.author: leah

customer_reviews.title: Great Kit for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Arrived fast and came with everything you need to get stared with your hive!
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Good quality " starter " kit
customer_reviews.text: Good quality " starter " kit. Very much so just a starter kit . You need two of these boxes plus two supers and a feeder too have a complete hive
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great kit for starting bees, you can't beat this price anywhere
customer_reviews.author: tammy bierer

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: Great quality product. Our new bee colony is thriving in their new box.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great beginner set up
customer_reviews.text: I've got my hive up and running. These products all work great, and the tools included all seem high quality. I do think people should splurge and get the whole body suit instead of just a hat and gloves. I've been stung several times now
customer_reviews.author: Scott Connery

customer_reviews.title: Everything I need but the bees
customer_reviews.text: Trying to attract a beautiful swarm that has made a home in my old cedar tree. Hope I can attract the next queen.
customer_reviews.author: J. Alexander

customer_reviews.title: This is an excellent start up kit
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent start up kit! Great for the price & a very convenient pack of tools. The necessities I'd say, and a great gift for anyone starting up a bee keeping hobby!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic starter set. Great quality. Well made. Our bees are happy and so is our beekeeping son!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Allen-LeBlanc

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this as a gift for my husband. ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift for my husband. He said "it was ok". It had it's problems but all in all ok.
customer_reviews.author: tiana hodge

customer_reviews.title: Grandparent project
customer_reviews.text: Having had bees in the past when our sons were young, but then getting too busy to continue with them, my husband is now back to teaching the next generation about bee-keeping. It has been of great interest to our grandchildren to see the new hives loaded with bees and to watch and wait for the time we can harvest the honey.
customer_reviews.author: LouieG

customer_reviews.title: Buzz
customer_reviews.text: Looking forward to my son using this! We need the bees! It should be a good starter kit. Time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Missy H

customer_reviews.title: This is quality stuff but very basic starter kit. ...
customer_reviews.text: This is quality stuff but very basic starter kit. my only complaint is that the vail sent in this kit requires a helmet that is not provided.I expected everything in the box to be complete and usable on arrival based on description.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome starter package!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome starter package! I can't wait to get my bees! Be aware that you will need two more hives to raise bees, if you want to harvest any honey.
customer_reviews.author: Old55Ford

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Will be fun to work with in establishing my new hobby.
customer_reviews.author: forrest lynch

customer_reviews.title: He seems to think it will be great!
customer_reviews.text: Got it for a friend who wants to start beekeeping. He seems to think it will be great!
customer_reviews.author: lorraine leadingham

customer_reviews.title: I am very happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: I got this ad a gift for my husband. I am very happy with this product. It was packaged very nicely and included very clear instructions. He is very excited to try it out.
customer_reviews.author: Kierra Brecht

customer_reviews.title: I think the flow hive is a better value overall
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what it says it is, but we wish we would have purchased a flow hive. Yes, the investment is more at first, but you have to purchase fewer things and it is just easier to use. We will likely sell this product (too late to return-and it has been used) and purchase a flow hive as soon as possible-it is not a top priority. Bottom line, if you want to have a hobby hive, I think the flow hive is a better value overall.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: love item
customer_reviews.text: received item very swiftly. well satisfied with my purchase. it came fully assembled. thanks sookie2012
customer_reviews.author: sookie2012

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Nice item but I wish the outside of the box did not show a picture of the contents! This was a christmas present for my husband which he saw and I also don't like my items shown to the public before they arrive at my house.
customer_reviews.author: Leticia

customer_reviews.title: They don't tell you to order staples for the hive box and bottom
customer_reviews.text: They did not include the hive staple's and now they want over $5 for a pound of staples and over $9 for shipping. You only need 4 staples for this hive box and that's not any where's near a pound. It would have been real easy for them to include 4 staples in the kit, I called Mann Lake on this and they don't care.
customer_reviews.author: dawoo

product_meta.title: Basic Beekeeping Starter Kit, Completely Assembled, Painted, Made In The USA
product_meta.description: This 10 frame traditional basic starter kit is made in the USA and comes complete with what you need to get started as a beekeeper. Includes one 10 frame 9-5/8-inch assembled, painted hive body, ten 9-1/8-inch assembled wood frames with waxed yellow Rite-Cell foundation, assembled painted telescoping cover with inner cover, assembled painted bottom board with reducer, one 10-inch hive tool, one pair economy leather gloves (large, color may vary), one Alexander bee veil, one dome top smoker with guard, the Starting Right with Bees book. Measures 22-inch length by 18-1/2-inch width by 13-1/7-inch height.
feature_bullets: Completely assembled and ready for bees

Kit includes one painted 10 frame 9-5/8-inch assembled hive body, ten 9-1/8-assembled wood frames with yellow waxed RiteCell foundation, painted bottom board with entrance reducer, and painted telescoping cover with inner cover
Also contains one large pair of economy leather gloves, one Alexander bee veil, one smoker with guard, one hive tool, and the Starting Right with Bees book
Measures 22-inch length by 18-1/2-inch width by 13-1/7-inch height

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
